a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Consumption-based vs. territorial CO₂ emissions per capita, 2021
Consumption-based emissions include those from fossil fuels and industry. Land-use change emissions are not
included. Countries above the diagonal line are net importers of CO₂.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2023) and other sources
